data.lyric:
[ti:Ghost]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Ghost - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:04.66]Lyrics by：Stefan Johnson/Justin Bieber/Michael Pollack/Jonathan Bellion/Jordan K. Johnson
[00:09.32]Composed by：Stefan Johnson/Justin Bieber/Michael Pollack/Jonathan Bellion/Jordan K. Johnson
[00:13.99]Youngblood thinks there's always tomorrow
[00:19.96]I miss your touch on nights when I'm hollow
[00:26.14]I know you cross the bridge that I can't follow
[00:32.31]Since the love that you left is all that I get
[00:35.69]I want you to know that
[00:38.04]If I can't be close to you
[00:42.26]I'll settle for the ghost of you
[00:44.65]
[00:45.54]I miss you more than life
[00:48.25]More than life
[00:50.11]And if you can't be next to me
[00:54.79]Your memory is ecstasy
[00:57.87]I miss you more than life
[01:01.04]I miss you more than life
[01:03.72]Youngblood thinks there's always tomorrow
[01:06.82]Woo
[01:09.79]I need more time but time can't be borrowed
[01:16.09]I'd leave it all behind if I could follow
[01:21.99]Since the love that you left is all that I get
[01:25.54]I want you to know that
[01:27.91]If I can't be close to you
[01:32.12]I'll settle for the ghost of you
[01:35.27]I miss you more than life yeah
[01:40.12]And if you can't be next to me
[01:44.68]Your memory is ecstasy
[01:47.79]I miss you more than life
[01:50.96]I miss you more than life
[01:55.89]Whoa oh oh-oh
[02:01.46]More than life
[02:04.41]Oh-oh
[02:05.03]So if I can't get close to you
[02:09.59]I'll settle for the ghost of you
[02:12.71]I miss you more than life
[02:17.39]And if you can't be next to me
[02:21.97]Your memory is ecstasy
[02:25.17]I miss you more than life
[02:28.26]I miss you more than life
data.trans:
[ti:Ghost]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:Justice (中国特别版)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.66]//
[00:09.32]//
[00:13.99]年轻人相信 美好明天终将到来
[00:19.96]空虚的夜晚 无比思念你指尖的温柔
[00:26.14]我知道你已迈出那一步 我跟不上你的脚步
[00:32.31]因为你留下的爱是我得到的全部
[00:35.69]我想要你知道
[00:38.04]如果我不能在你身旁
[00:42.26]有你留下的回忆作伴 我也能接受
[00:44.65]
[00:45.54]我对你的思念无以复加
[00:48.25]无以复加
[00:50.11]如果你不能在我身旁
[00:54.79]关于你的记忆 也能让我狂喜
[00:57.87]我对你的思念无以复加
[01:01.04]我对你的思念无以复加
[01:03.72]年轻人相信 美好明天终将到来
[01:06.82]//
[01:09.79]我需要更多时间 但时间借不来
[01:16.09]若能跟上你的步伐 我会把一切都抛在身后
[01:21.99]因为你留下的爱是我得到的全部
[01:25.54]我想要你知道
[01:27.91]如果我不能在你身旁
[01:32.12]有你留下的回忆作伴 我也能接受
[01:35.27]我对你的思念无以复加
[01:40.12]如果你不能在我身旁
[01:44.68]关于你的记忆 也能让我狂喜
[01:47.79]我对你的思念无以复加
[01:50.96]我对你的思念无以复加
[01:55.89]//
[02:01.46]无以复加
[02:04.41]//
[02:05.03]所以 如果我不能在你身旁
[02:09.59]有你留下的回忆作伴 我也能接受
[02:12.71]我对你的思念无以复加
[02:17.39]如果你不能在我身旁
[02:21.97]关于你的记忆 也能让我狂喜
[02:25.17]我对你的思念无以复加
